languages.text: "Инстинкт говорит о том же". {n}Сцепив зубы, Торбальд мрачнеет и становится похож на суровое каменное изваяние древнего божества бурь и гроз.{/n}
"My instinct tells me as much." {n}Thorbald grits his teeth, his face growing grim until it resembles an emotionless stone statue depicting an ancient deity of storms and thunder.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Инстинкт говорит о том же". {n}Сцепив зубы, Торбальд мрачнеет и становится похож на суровое каменное изваяние древнего божества бурь и гроз.{/n}

traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: “我的直觉也是这么告诉我的。”{n}索巴德咬紧牙关，面容变得越来越狰狞，仿佛远古风暴与雷霆之神的石雕一般阴沉。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My instinct tells me as much." {n}Thorbald grits his teeth, his face growing grim until it resembles an emotionless stone statue depicting an ancient deity of storms and thunder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我的直觉也是这么告诉我的。”{n}索巴德咬紧牙关，面容变得越来越狰狞，仿佛远古风暴与雷霆之神的石雕一般阴沉。{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: « C'est aussi ce que me dit mon instinct. » {n}Thorbald serre la mâchoire et son visage s'assombrit, jusqu'à ressembler à une statue de pierre sans la moindre émotion, à l'image d'une divinité des tempêtes et de la foudre des temps anciens.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My instinct tells me as much." {n}Thorbald grits his teeth, his face growing grim until it resembles an emotionless stone statue depicting an ancient deity of storms and thunder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est aussi ce que me dit mon instinct. {n}Thorbald serre la mâchoire et son visage s'assombrit, jusqu'à ressembler à une statue de pierre sans la moindre émotion, à l'image d'une divinité des tempêtes et de la foudre des temps anciens.{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: 「俺の本能もそう言っている」{n}トールバルドは歯を食いしばり、まるで古代の嵐と雷の神を描いた無感情な石像のように険しい表情を浮かべた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My instinct tells me as much." {n}Thorbald grits his teeth, his face growing grim until it resembles an emotionless stone statue depicting an ancient deity of storms and thunder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「俺の本能もそう言っている」{n}トールバルドは歯を食いしばり、まるで古代の嵐と雷の神を描いた無感情な石像のように険しい表情を浮かべた。{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: «Eso me decía el instinto». {n}Thorbald aprieta los dientes y su rostro adquiere tal hieratismo que se asemeja a una estatua de piedra que representa a una antigua deidad de las tormentas y los truenos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My instinct tells me as much." {n}Thorbald grits his teeth, his face growing grim until it resembles an emotionless stone statue depicting an ancient deity of storms and thunder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Eso me decía el instinto». {n}Thorbald aprieta los dientes y su rostro adquiere tal hieratismo que se asemeja a una estatua de piedra que representa a una antigua deidad de las tormentas y los truenos.{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: "Das hat mein Instinkt mir gesagt." {n}Thorbald beißt die Zähne zusammen. Seine Miene verdüstert sich, bis sie einer emotionslosen Steinstatue ähnelt, die eine uralte Gottheit der Stürme und des Donners darstellt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My instinct tells me as much." {n}Thorbald grits his teeth, his face growing grim until it resembles an emotionless stone statue depicting an ancient deity of storms and thunder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das hat mein Instinkt mir gesagt." {n}Thorbald beißt die Zähne zusammen. Seine Miene verdüstert sich, bis sie einer emotionslosen Steinstatue ähnelt, die eine uralte Gottheit der Stürme und des Donners darstellt.{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: "Güdülerim de aynı kanıda." {n}Thorbald dişlerini gıcırdatıyor. Yüzü ise karardıkça karararak fırtına ve tufanların kadim tanrısını tasvir eden, taştan bir heykeli andırmaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My instinct tells me as much." {n}Thorbald grits his teeth, his face growing grim until it resembles an emotionless stone statue depicting an ancient deity of storms and thunder.{/n}
